author: max
install_msg:
Thanks for installing. The coins you're getting is going to your `[p]bank balance`
You will only be able to `[p]beg` every 3 hours.
description: Begging or get random coins that goes to your bank balance, only work every 3 hours.
short: Begging or get random coins, only work every 3 hours.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
